sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input type="{{inputType}}">
</template>

<script>
export default {
    props: [
        'inputType',
    ]
}
</script>

<style>
input {
    min-width: 120px;
    height: 32px;
    outline: none;
    border: 1px solid #cccccc;
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 0 32px 0 16px;
}

input:focus {
    border-color: #08BF1E;
}

input::placeholder {
    color: var(--button-grey-text);
}
</style>
